title: How can I get Thunderbird 139.1 to create the same email categories and folders as those on my provider's webmail site?
content:
Thunderbird has eliminated a primary SENT category and I can't find how to get it and other primary folders within my provider, Spectrum Internet/Email, email website/webpage(s). How do I get them back? I do NOT want to have to uninstall Thunderbird, clear my cache, then reinstall it and set it all up from the get-go. Any real answers for me?

Thanks
creator: OldHeart1943

title: New password not activated
content: Created new password but it has not activated. New was accepted on the third of June by iPads, and pc but has now failed to do so
